name: Joustars
description:
Local multiplayer versus game. Stab your oponents weak point (the hilt) and score enough points to win!

Super short and simple game made for the One Minute Jam.

Made this in an afternoon so there are going to be bugs, but feel free to let me know and I will try to keep things updated. If you like it please consider donating!

Using the wonderful asset pack 16x16 DungeonTileset II by 0x72 (itch.io)
